description: A quick win: understand Mongol Military Tactics.

hook.text: Mongol armies were outnumbered in almost every battle they fought. They won anyway.

discovery.text: They used feigned retreats to lure enemies into traps. Armies that pursued found themselves surrounded.

climax.text: Cities often surrendered without a fight. Fear was the Mongols' most effective weapon.

quiz.question: What tactic did Mongols use to lure enemies into traps?
